pullRequest.title: feat(frontend): implement useAdmin hook
pullRequest.description:
This commit introduces a new `useAdmin` hook to encapsulate all admin-related API calls using TanStack Query.

The hook provides the following features:
- `status` and `config` queries for fetching system status and configuration.
- A `runDoctor` mutation for triggering a system health check.
- Returns `data`, `isLoading`, and `error` states for all queries and mutations.

This change simplifies state management in the admin dashboard by co-locating all admin-related data fetching logic in a single, reusable hook.

Added a new test file `useAdmin.test.tsx` to ensure the hook's functionality is working as expected. This includes tests for fetching system status, configuration, and running the doctor mutation. The tests mock the API calls to isolate the hook's behavior.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [3496437974377730685](https://jules.google.com/task/3496437974377730685) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*

pullRequest.title: Add E2E Test for DashboardView
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces a new Playwright end-to-end test for the main `DashboardView` in the frontend application. The test ensures that all key components of the dashboard, such as the header, KPI cards, and status indicators, render correctly after a user is authenticated. To facilitate this, `data-testid` attributes have been added to the `DashboardView` component, providing stable selectors for the test. Additionally, the `.gitignore` file has been updated to exclude Playwright's test report and result directories from version control.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [9266578638203230983](https://jules.google.com/task/9266578638203230983) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*

pullRequest.title: Create E2E Test for LoginView
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces a new Playwright end-to-end test for the `LoginView` component to validate the primary user login flow.

Key changes:
- Added `frontend/src/tests/e2e/login.spec.ts` with a test case for the login happy path.
- Updated `frontend/src/views/LoginView.tsx` to include `data-testid` attributes for more resilient test selectors.
- Updated `frontend/.gitignore` to exclude Playwright test reports and results from version control.

---
